ComicInfo.Title: Murder By Microphone Part II; "Plunder Of The Air Pirates!"; The Better Half!; "Miss The Beatles!"
ComicInfo.Summary: While waiting in line outside the Ed Sullivan Theatre to catch a glimpse of The Beatles, Patty keeps running off to fight crooks as Ladybug.
